page.title: 01General Description
page.content: The main part of the block for this Survey is known as "The Deepings".It is broadly a residential area for the expanding town of Peterborough situated 10 kilometres to the South. It has developed from the drainage work of the Deeping Fen in the 16th century and local names are Deeping St Nicholas,Deeping St James,Market Deeping and West Deeping.The population is now over 10 000 within this area and over 75% of the houses have been built within the last twenty years.Industry is now developing, mainly in Market Deeping and is generall well-served by the main North-South road between Perborough and Lincoln and the East-West road from the Midlands to the East coast the junction of which is seen on photograph A.
